articles.title: Corrupt oil trader turns on colleagues in massive Africa bribe case - News24
articles.description: Glencore and some of its executives face the prospect of steep fines and prison in a far-reaching investigation of tactics in numerous countries and commodity markets.
articles.content:
• Former Glencore trader Anthony Stimler paid large bribes to African officials and intermediaries.
